ComicInfo.Title: The Shoremouth Horror; The Hag of Red River; Deadly Diamond; Curse of Rockwood; The Haunted Bed; Tragedy of Terror
ComicInfo.Summary:
Tennessee folklore story: Kate Batts returns from the dead to haunt the living.
When count Ferenzy runs down and kills the gypsy Elena, a curse is wrought upon his family. A diamond passes from hand to hand, causing the death of its owner.
At Rockwood castle, old Sir Reginald quarrels with his cousin Abby and gets killed in the process. When his niece Cynthia arrives to accept the inheritance, Abby tries to kill her too. But Cynthia is protected by a cursed knight watching over the family for generations.
Two friends stay at a haunted hotel room in Bruges and get attacked by a ghost.
In a Parisian "Theatre of Horrors" the French blue-beard Gille de Retz comes alive again. American student of the occult Hilary and his French fianc√©e Stephanie manage to render the fiend powerless.
